http://langmate.jp/en/

English
・Search
You can find Japanese people who wish to exchange internationally.
・Match
Let's connect the card with Japanese people from home and abroad.
If you like it let's send LIKE with the right swipe.
・High five!
You can send message with Like to the user you want to chat.
・New Matched
Displays the matched users.
・Chats
Displays users who are chatting with you.
・Chat room
You can hide your face and chat about your favorite theme.
・Likes
Displays users who have Liked to you.
・Interested in you
Display user who viewed your profile.
・Boost
You will be displayed preferentially at "Match" for 1 hour only.
・Get Coin
You can purchase coins.
Or, You can get bonus coins by watching video ad.

I am sorry for inconveniencing users due to malfunction.
We solved the following problems in this version.
① Inheritance of VIP data from old version
② Crash with NEWS screen
③ Other, minor bugs
If there is a problem, please report to langmate.jp.
I will continue to update it once every 3 to 5 days.
Thank you.

fix some bugs
· A problem with some VIP users
· Shutdown bug when opening chat
· Bugs where the same user appears in news
· Fixed other minor bugs
I'm sorry for the trouble.
In case of trouble
Please contact langmateapp@gmail.com

This version of Fix Point
- improve upload/delete image and fix crash bug
- fix crash bug when pull the refresh view
- fix crash bug for iPad users
- add show user id - for user support -
- can edit age/name once
- other bugs
About opinions and troubles
Please send e-mail.
langmateapp@gmail.com
or langmate.jp
Thank you.

- improve chat system
- fix bugs
About opinions and troubles

・Fixed some minor bugs
Bugs and opinions

I am always grateful for your help.
fix some bugs

- active age filter
- improve match performance

*** NEW LANGMATE VERSION 4! ****

We’ve been hard at work making Langmate better for you! We are very happy to release this new version, completely redesigned, with a new interface and new functionalities!
Fixes bug

The new version contains:
+ Updated new report and rating popups design
+ Bug fixes and UI improvements
Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
support@langmate.jp
Have fun with Langmate!

Thanks for using Langmate!
What’s new in this update?
• Tags! You can show your likes and interests to everyone and find like-minded people. They’re great as an ice breaker!
• New users account creation. Brand new and exciting design for a better sign up experience.
• New lists. Languages, nationalities, countries and cities, we have cleaned up our lists and redesigned how you browse them.
• Anti-scam measures. At Langmate we’re working hard every day to make sure your experience is as safe and as secure as possible. We have included a new system to find and block scammers. But remember, if you find any suspicious account, you can always report it within the app.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements. Our bug hunt paid off. Bugs have been eliminated!
Have fun with Langmate! (^_^)/
If you have any feedbacks or run into issues, please contact us at support@langmate.jp, we’re happy to help!

Thanks for using Langmate!
